summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 56th Street from 5th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 98701 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
